items.text: The Pine Island Glacier is like a giant ice puzzle, with pieces breaking off to form icebergs!
When the glacier cracks, it sends huge blocks of ice crashing into the sea, creating spectacular splashes!
These glaciers can be over 18 miles long, making them some of the largest ice formations on Earth!
